verbs.description: President Donald Trump probably [V: wo] n't decide whether to sit down for an interview with special counsel Robert Mueller until after the president 's summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-ADV: probably] [ARGM-MOD: wo] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: decide] [ARG1: whether to sit down for an interview with special counsel Robert Mueller until after the president 's summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .

[ARG1: President Donald Trump] probably wo n't decide whether to [V: sit] down [ARGM-PRP: for an interview with special counsel Robert Mueller] [ARGM-TMP: until after the president 's summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
